channel.title: Posts on Don's Sweeper
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Don's Sweeper

item.title: Repair and service
item.description: Don’s Sweeper is a full-service repair and refurbishment center, offering repair on most popular vacuum brands.

item.title: Vacuum Sales
item.description: We offer a full range of new vacuums, a selection of used sweepers, and a full line of bags, belts, and accessories for most popular brands.

item.title: About Us
item.description: Don’s Sweeper offers full service, sales, cleaning, and maintanence of most major brands. We service Dyson, Riccar, Electrolux, Aerus, Rainbow, Shark, Oreck, Kirby, Hoover, Eureka, Cirrus, and more.
